questions.question: What is the primary color scheme visually dominating the textual elements presented in the image?

Based on the visual appearance, what language(s) are used in the presented text?
What is the overall font style of the larger text stating the product's dietary suitability?
Describe the case of the lettering used in the main statement about the product’s suitability for a specific diet.
What is the style of the brackets enclosing the translations of the main statement?
Describe the text's alignment within the rectangular frame of the image?
What is the general shape of the text block containing all textual elements on the presented image?

What language is used in the first line which is the main statement about the product?

Does the image include any pictorial elements besides text?
